name: Salade Arabe Traditionnelle (Moroccan Tomato Salad)
keywords: green pepper, tomato, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 small green pepper, cored, seeded and deveined
1 1/2 cups cored, peeled, seeded tomatoes cut into half-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the pepper into strips about half an inch wide. Cut the strips crosswise into thin slices. There should be about 1/3 cup. If there is more than that, save the remaining for another use.
Put the pepper in a bowl and add the remaining ingredients. Blend. Chill.
